wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Jones  (born 1870) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1893 and 1899, playing 6 matches. He played his first match on 18 March 1893 against Scotland and his last match on 20 March 1899 against England. At club level, he played for Wrexham and Druids.
